name: Backend API PRD
description: Standard RESTful API service with CRUD operations, authentication, and database integration

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: A RESTful API service providing core business logic, data persistence, and integration with external systems.

sections.title: Problem Statement
sections.content: Applications need a reliable, scalable backend to handle requests, manage data, and coordinate with frontend services.

sections.title: Functional Requirements
sections.content: CRUD operations, user authentication with JWT, request validation, error handling, rate limiting

sections.title: Non-Functional Requirements
sections.content: Performance < 200ms (p95), 99.9% uptime, HTTPS enforced, horizontal scaling support

sections.title: Technical Stack
sections.content: Node.js 18+, Express, MongoDB/PostgreSQL, JWT, Zod validation, Swagger/OpenAPI
